author: Omkar Godbole
title: Third Halving Turns Out to Be Non-Event for Bitcoin Price
description: Bitcoin's price volatility has declined following the network's third mining reward halving event on Monday.
content:
Bitcoin's price volatility has declined following the network's third mining reward halving event on Monday.  
The reward per block mined on bitcoin's blockchain was reduced to 6.25 BTC from 12.5 BTC at 19:23 UTC, when the cryptocurrency was trading near $8,… [+3792 chars]
